original_text: But Jehoram continued to do the same bad things that Nebat's son Jeroboam had done. Jeroboam had caused many people in Israel to do those sins, and Jehoram did not stop doing them himself.
korean_text: 그러나 그가 느밧의 아들 여로보암이 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 그 죄를 따라 행하고 떠나지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Jehoram continued to do the same bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여호람은 동일한 나쁜 일들을 계속했습니다

sentences.original_text: that Nebat's son Jeroboam had done
Jeroboam had caused many people in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암은 이스라엘의 많은 사람들에게 영향을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: and Jehoram did not stop doing them himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호람은 스스로 그것들을 멈추지 않았습니다
